method: **Pickpocketing Men/Women:** Start here. Use sticky fingers if you have them, but it's very quick.
tips: Just get through these first few levels.

method: **Thieves' Guild Capers:** Complete the Buyers and Cellars quests as you level up. Use the Guild for safecracking preparation.
tips: Unlock the **Mastery** upgrades in the guild asap.

method: **Pickpocketing HAM Members:** Easy to thrive, decent XP for low levels.
tips: Wear HAM robes to decrease fail chance.

method: **Safecracking:** This is the meta. Rotate through safes in the Thieves' Guild and Wilderness (if brave/high level) or huge circuit.
tips: Unlock the **Stethoscope** and **Clippers** from the Guild. No fail chance once you have the level. Highly AFK.

method: **Crux Eqal Knights:** Pickpocket these outside Varrock Garden. requires Garden of Tranquillity.
tips: Use **Sticky Fingers** relic and **Master Camouflage Outfit** for 100% AFK for 5 mins at a time.

method: **Prifddinas Elves:** Rotate between clans in Prifddinas. Very AFK, decent money/items.
tips: Requires **Plague's End**. Auto-pickpocket makes this very chill.
